frontmatter.title: Metrics on AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry JavaScript SDK
frontmatter.description: Metrics auto instrumentation has not been supported in AOT/OpenTelemetry yet. We have to manually instrumenting code in the application to generate application metrics. Here is an example with steps for modifying application code to create metrics with JavaScript SDK.
